attributes.review: This was just so inappropriate! The second I opened this app, a very disturbing and ugly pig like creature popped up and scared my grandma . SHE HAS HEART PROBLEMS !! SHE ALMOST DIED DUE TO THAT THING 🤢🤢 What if my children were on my phone ??? I typed in my email and it started to hack my account ! The service then said it was normal and didn’t help at all!! Next thing I knew they took all my money and I couldn’t do anything about it. Please send some help. Please done encourage this app anymore . I beg of you
attributes.title: very disturbing !!

attributes.review: i opened up the app then put in my phone number and after a few days they started spamming my phone number with useless information AND they wouldnt stop the messages even after i told them to stop. Then today I opened up my phone to see a Trump wallpaper on my phone that I had NEVER put there. Im FURIOUS! HOW DARE THEY CHANGE MY PHONE AND SPAM ME. In one of the messages they sent me to my phone number they called me fat and ugly... I cannot withstand this harassment and bullying.
attributes.userName: stream mono by rm from bts
attributes.title: TERRIBLE!

attributes.review: honestly this app is so horrible. it slows down your phone and also leaks your number to random people. i’ve been getting so many random messages from complete messages it’s crazy. it also keeps telling me it needs my address and i keep clicking no and it’s basically demanding. the app also makes random sounds in the middle of the night and put random pop ups and pictures on my phone. THIS APP IS HORRIBLE.
attributes.title: horrible app

attributes.review:
I got this app for my little sister so she can catch up on mr Donald and his shenanigans only to open up the app to see that this women named peaches was twerking on camera.🥵😡me and my sis are now traumatized and are going to see a shrink. Which may I add cost lots of money that my insurance does not cover. To conclude this review I would like to say that getting your news from this app is extremely unreliable 😤😤😤and I found a better app named tik Tok which is much better!😍😹 
Love
-Mike Whocheese. Hairy
attributes.title: Traumatized 😢

attributes.review: When i first opened the app i was immediately asked for personal private information that i was not comfortable sharing😤😤. It felt like i was getting verbally attacked and i felt threatened 😭😭. then after that out of the blue it crashed my phone 😔 i kept trying to reopen it and then suddenly it started crashing over and over and over again and overheating my phone. 0/10 if i could rate it that i would never EVER install this app EVERE AGAIN.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP

attributes.review:
I opened the app to find it needed my phone number and no I will not give up my
Phone number to some random app ran by a cheeto😳 Overall it was very glitchy and was not worth the 1 minute I downloaded it to write this review for🤚🏼 it was an absolute disgrace to open the app and find the “president” pop up ughh👨‍🦰 no thanks I will be deleting the app as soon as possible!!! Do not recommend! this is not MY president😳I would put NO stars if I could💅🏼✨🧚🏼‍♀️
attributes.title: Horrible App🤮🤚🏼

attributes.review: JUST HORRIBLE. when i tried searching it up i choked then when i clicked download i went into cardiac arrest. they asked me for my number IM A MINOR!! they’re sending inappropriate texts coded in numbers. and i went blind when i saw his face. THIS HAS LEFT ME IN COMPLETE AND UTTER SHOCK. my heart and both of my lungs fell out reading the terms how disrespectful of them! now i have no sight, asthma, no lungs, and no heart ALL BECAUSE OF THIS APP! i’m currently in the hospital and someone is typing this for me due to my blindness but they said IM GONNA DIE. SCREW THIS APP!!!
attributes.title: TRUMP IS MEAN

attributes.review:
This app is so horrible that it made my eyes fall out, I can see now because i got surgery which cost A LOT OF MONEY ALL BECAUSE OF THIS STUPID APP. It made my pet pterodactyl come back to life and now its on the loose:(  This app is the reason why i have cancer and no friends. They also asked me where i lived which was very creepy and now i can’t sleep at night. Trump kept me in his basement for 69 months and he only fed me this white stuff coming from his no no square. 

OH and

KARENS SHUT UP plz:) thank you😊
attributes.title: HORRIBLE

attributes.review: I cannot believe how trash this app is. I downloaded it and not only were the fundamental functions of the app both slow and unresponsive, but after I downloaded, a virus also took hold of my phone and deleted a bunch of my information. I'm missing contacts, apps, calls, and text messages that were here before I downloaded the app. Super disappointed, would absolutely give 0 stars if I could. 😡😡😡
attributes.title: Gave my phone a VIRUS

attributes.review: This was just a couple waste of my time and storage. There was a glitch every 5 seconds and everything I could see was just a Cheeto. Like boy even a flaming hot Cheeto it was CHEESE😭😭 anyway there was very disturbing pictures which isn’t good for anyone to see. Luckly I did have eye protection so there was little to no damage. This app is very low quality and just not good at all. There are better options in the App Store but this is NOT where it’s at.
attributes.title: never again...
